title: Best way to level up a smurf?

replies.body: Buy account, thats what everyone seems to do these days. + its cheaper lel
From memory, finish the games as close to 20 minutes as possible. If you win too quick you get less IP and XP or something like that. I just finished a game at 20:01.
Pretty sure intermediate bots are the best. Boring tho lel
Play a game on it here or there, daily win bonus, buy xp bonus' etc if you want to pay 4.
buy it for like $15 off one of those bot farmers lol. sure beats grinding for months
